##Country Cook: "No matter how important it is to make money, you can't play tricks on your life. "

WMSYGSDR

Function introduction, each line has the earnest person, again the ordinary person also has the extraordinary story. Huazhong University of Science and Technology Press Official non-fiction story platform, the story of the people will meet here.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
“

- In the event of an outbreak -

My father, as the head of the family, used more than 10,000 yuan of the family's grain sales as money for the purchase of goods to settle with the supplier, according to his instructions to us in the words: "We have lost, do not let others lose, also let people go home a good new year. "

”

“

- In the event of an outbreak -

My father, as the head of the family, used more than 10,000 yuan of the family's grain sales as money for the purchase of goods to settle with the supplier, according to his instructions to us in the words: "We have lost, do not let others lose, also let people go home a good new year. "

- In the event of an outbreak -

My father, as the head of the family, used more than 10,000 yuan of the family's grain sales as money for the purchase of goods to settle with the supplier, according to his instructions to us in the words: "We have lost, do not let others lose, also let people go home a good new year. "

”

Story exercise

Title 59

1

A few months before the Spring Festival in 2020, my father, a farmer at home, called me early. I was busy in the kitchen when I got the call. My father said on the phone that he had a few dinners over the New Year, and he wanted me to come back and help.

"Dad is getting old, " his gravelly voice explained on the other end of the phone. "I can't do it alone. If I hire someone, I won't make any money. I want you to come back and help me during the New Year. "

I nodded, promising my father that I would hand in my resignation soon. Those in the catering industry who want to go home for the next year can only quit their jobs, not to mention the fact that they haven't made much money in Shanghai in recent years. Their counterparts also say that the business of catering is also good, and they specialize in rural wedding banquets, Full Moon Wine, college banquets, and so on, i thought I'd go back and learn from my father, see if I could do it.

A month later, the process of resignation was also examined and approved on New Year's Day. I packed up my dorm room, bought a high-speed train ticket for the day, and finally set foot on the road to Anhui, my hometown, which I had not been to for many years.

I leaned back in the high-speed rail chair, mind empty, my mind gradually recalled when my father around to others to cook the days of the country.

When a family in our rural area has a red and white wedding and needs someone to take charge of it, they often come to my father for help. When my father was young, he went out to study cooking for a few years, and it was still very tasty to cook. Two or three earth stoves were set up to handle the work. The village aunts came over to help wash vegetables and cut meat. The helpers went to each household to borrow tables, stools, bowls and chopsticks. And like me, the children, can not help, had to pile up in the side of the cat, from time to time from the table to grab a handful of peanuts to eat.

My father did all this for free, purely to help. He said, "people in the village talk about money and it's divided up. Everyone's family name in the same village is their relatives. How can you collect money for helping your relatives? " But the host family would also give my father two or three packs of cigarettes, father wouldn't say no to that. He took it with a smile.

When I was young, I asked my father, "Dad, why don't you ask for money? You can buy a lot of cigarettes and lollipops that way. " My father smiled, touched my head and said, "you're too young to measure everything in money. There's a difference between receiving money and receiving cigarettes. "

"after we accepted the cigarette, the host family made a note of our gratitude. Later, when we were in trouble, they would help us too, which was far beyond the money. " I nodded half-heartedly and pestered my father to go to the store to buy lollipops to eat.

I fell asleep on the back of my chair, woke up a few hours later, got on the train and called my father ahead of time. My father cut his time and drove early near the high-speed railway station waiting for me. I pulled my suitcase out of the station, i saw my father waving at me from a distance.

My father helped me carry the suitcase to the car, turned around and said with a smile, "it's been a long time, has my son lost a lot of weight? " I felt my face in the rearview mirror of the car, "No AH, or the original weight has not changed. " I asked my father to do for others what the father smiled: "are good things, good things. "

Back Home, my house is clean and tidy, mother is busy in the kitchen, see me back is also a face of joy.

After dinner, my father took over the list of the previous rural banquet to me to see, about years ago, after four or five, a set a dozen tables. My father figured he could earn 10,000 or 20,000 yuan even in these hard days. He had the experience to do this, and had arranged these things well. All I had to do was follow him and do things with him.

And the mother has the country life's careful budget, is arranged to purchase the vegetable. My father also rented a freezer early to store some processed, semi-finished goods.

2

Years ago, my father took me to do a wedding banquet or two. Although it was hard to get up in the morning and work late at night, the general reaction was good. Everyone praised me for having inherited my father's skills and made this dish tasty, my uncle and aunt, who had a good thing to do, took the opportunity to introduce me to someone. I squatted by the fire, my face flushed, the father is in the side smoking a pipe: "trouble his aunt snack, " said the smile on his face after how can not hide.

In the middle of January, my father and his suppliers had agreed on the Spring Festival stock, and I volunteered to help my father to check the quality of the food, to see if there was any cheating. His father snorted: "The city people like to do this thing, he tried to do in the countryside, will never have a business to come. "

I do not believe what father said, angrily checked again, found that the quality of these dishes are still good, give the portion is also more than we order.

All kinds of fresh vegetables, eggs, fresh meat, as well as meat products, the prices of these things have increased considerably near the Spring Festival, and the Spring Festival suppliers have to rest for a few days, the father first paid the supplier, the supplier to prepare. In previous years like I work in a restaurant, prepare Spring Festival stock, the number of preparation can be much more than my father.

Mother joked that the house has become a vegetable market, this year do not have to prepare their own new year goods. Potatoes, onions, radishes and more -- easy to store vegetables as much as possible -- are kept at home, with pork belly, hock, beef and mutton stuffed in the freezer.

A few days ago, the news began to cover the story of the coronavirus infection. My father sat on the threshold with a bowl and chopsticks in his face, and I didn't take it to heart. I thought it was just a few cases. With China's strong national power, it'll be under control soon.

My father joked, thinking that the first pot of gold in the year of the rat would soon be in his hands.

On January 24, my sister, who worked in Tianjin, came back. The whole family got together to prepare the New Year's Eve dinner. My father was happily handling a grass carp. Suddenly a phone call came in. My father left me to clean up and answer the phone.

I was scraping grass carp scales, and in a few moments, the frowning father came with a cigarette dangling from his mouth, "Lao Wang from the next village just called and canceled his family's fifth day full moon wine, " my voice was Husky. "Is it because of the recent viral pneumonia? " I asked. "It's right for them to be cautious with their children. "

I pulled out my mobile phone and looked up the news on the Internet. Only then did I know that Wuhan was closed yesterday. I hurriedly told my father the news. My father's brow tightened even more, i comforted my father and said, "Wuhan is far away, it won't affect us here, it's fine. " Then, following a hot search, more than a dozen provinces and cities launched a public health response level one. I clicked in to check the list, impressively, I saw that Anhui was one of them.

I couldn't sit still any longer. Feeling the gravity of the situation, my father drove us to the town to buy face masks, disinfectant and other protective materials. The big supermarkets were packed with people who had come to snap up face masks.

We went for a stroll and managed to buy some face masks and hand sanitizer from acquaintances. Although others do not do the banquet, his family's New Year's Eve dinner or to eat, my father personally cooked the New Year's Eve dinner, which in normal times, but not much.

3

On the first day of the New Year, my cat was in bed watching the news. The number of infections was on the rise. My father walked around the house, standing and sitting, and there were seven or eight cigarette butts on the floor.

Father gritted his teeth and made a decision.

He reached out to the families who had not yet canceled their reservations, explained the stakes, and persuaded them to cancel. Mother complained father said, the money has not seen, but also lost a lot. Father Retorts: "Make money again important, that also can not take the life to joke. "

"Food is the first priority for the people. " This is when I learn to cook, the master taught me, even now to eat the environment is not safe, forced to do this banquet, not harm others? My father was a little excited, and I remember my Abecedarian had taught me the same thing, and now it sounded more like a spiritual inheritance coming from my father's mouth.

My father was not good at words, but everything he said made sense, and he was very honest and kind in doing things. He called again to ask people to pull back the tables, chairs, chairs, and cutlery that had already been sent to him, and this money is not a penny less to pay people, according to the original price. The vegetables, beef and mutton, and eggs that we had asked our suppliers to prepare had been prepared just as my father had requested.

But now the booking table has all been cancelled, these prepared raw materials have no use. The matter was handled by the mother herself. Originally, she wanted to discuss with others to return it, but they were also anxious to take the money home for the New Year, and they can't handle it after the New Year.

My mother was worried and worried when she saw the yard full of things. In the next few days, my father wanted to go out wearing a mask and drive some to his relatives and friends. However, as the epidemic became more serious, the village committee had already received an important notice to prevent the epidemic, the way in and out of the village was blocked, in and out of the temperature register and limit the number of people, father has not been out of the village gate was stopped down to persuade back.

Seven or eight boxes of eggs, more than 100 catties of all kinds of fresh vegetables, at home also can not eat, watching will be bad in the hand, heavy losses.

When the Party secretary of the village visited the family home, he learned that the father had taken the initiative to cancel the banquet and that the raw materials could not be handled. He praised the father for doing the right thing and avoiding the gathering of crowds, and specifically told us to take things to the village committee door, he called on the loudspeaker to help us in the home.

The villagers all know his father's character through their daily life, and are willing to help him this favor, to reduce the loss of our family. And the father wears a mask to change, from a farmer to a vegetable farmer, he set the price is very fair, lower than the market price to a dime or two.

I am busy all morning, to the aunt and uncle said eggs, father also deliberately go home, put out some of the mask bought at home before, see who did not put on the mask in time, forced to put a few into his hands.

4

Over the next few days, every intersection in the village was strictly guarded, and vehicles were not allowed to enter or leave. Even the villagers who came back after years to offer sacrifices to their ancestors, the village chief and the secretary assigned an empty house for them to live in, and urged them earnestly not to offer sacrifices to their ancestors, it's a high-risk crowd, so let's get them through the 14-day quarantine.

Small villages appear deserted, gathered together in previous years to eat melon seeds, playing cards of young people, all nest at home watching television, playing games. Occasionally there are a few pedestrians on the road, face tightly wearing a mask in a hurry.

My father had been so busy all his life that he suddenly felt uneasy about being idle. He always wanted to go out to the fields to see how the wheat was doing. It was snowing, and it was cold, and Mcghan was not cold. I advised my father not to go out and stay at home, although there is no case in the village at present, but it is difficult to guarantee what accident.

SARS in 2003, I was still young, only three years old just learned to walk. But the old people in the village have experienced it. There is a faint smell of vinegar in the village. The old people firmly believe that fumigating vinegar can kill the coronavirus in the air. From time to time, there are also naughty children in the village who put out rubbing cannons and black spiders for 50 cents a box, the smell of vinegar mixed with the smell of gunpowder after the firecracker burst, and the air seemed to be full of unknown dangers.

On the fifth day of the Lunar New Year, according to the rules in my hometown, there has always been the custom of welcoming the god of wealth. On the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, the village chief wore a mask and went door-to-door informing him that he was not allowed to go out. I have been away from home for many years, but I do not know very much about these customs. My mother was somewhat worried, "If the door doesn't open, how can the God of Wealth Get in? "

My father was not happy to see my mother, took me to joke, "the original take you back to see a few young girls, to know, it seems that this is also lost. " I face like, but my mother covered his mouth secretly smiled.

My father patted me on the shoulder and sighed. "The bride price I saved for you is gone. " I handed my father a cigarette. "I don't want to get married so early. Don't worry about it too much. When the epidemic is over, I'll go to Shanghai and try again. "

My sister in the side knock melon seeds said with a smile: "brother, developed, do not forget sister me. " Listening to mom and dad also laughed, as if the laughter of the family dispelled the clouds in recent days.

Epidemic ruthless, human feeling, I hope this winter passed quickly.

-END-

- I'm a storyteller. -

//
A cook who doesn't want to be a writer is not a good cook,

Living in a Ordinary World, with an interesting soul. //
